trans-unit.target: 六方杀阵

trans-unit.resname: AFC·101 | Hex | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Destroy six target creatures.
trans-unit.target: 消灭六个目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·101 | Hex | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When killing five just isn't enough.
trans-unit.target: 有时候杀五个还不够。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·102 | Marionette Master | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Marionette Master
trans-unit.target: 弄偶大师

trans-unit.resname: AFC·102 | Marionette Master | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Fabricate 3 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put three +1/+1 counters on it or create three 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.)
trans-unit.target: 装配3（当此生物进战场时，在其上放置三个+1/+1指示物或派出三个1/1无色自动机衍生神器生物。）

trans-unit.resname: AFC·102 | Marionette Master | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever an artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to Marionette Master's power.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的神器从战场进入坟墓场时，目标对手失去等同于弄偶大师力量的生命。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·103 | Necromantic Selection | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Necromantic Selection
trans-unit.target: 物尽天择

trans-unit.resname: AFC·103 | Necromantic Selection | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures, then return a creature card put into a graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control. It's a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types. Exile Necromantic Selection.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有生物，然后将一张以此法进入坟墓场的生物牌在你的操控下移回战场。它额外具有黑色此颜色与灵俑此类别。放逐物尽天择。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·103 | Necromantic Selection | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It shambled from the cloud of ash and bone dust, undeterred by its own extinction.
trans-unit.target: 残灰散尽，骨骸落定，它自混沌中蹒跚而出，饶是自身灭绝也未能惊动分毫。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·104 | Ogre Slumlord | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ogre Slumlord
trans-unit.target: 贫窟霸食人魔

trans-unit.resname: AFC·104 | Ogre Slumlord | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may create a 1/1 black Rat creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个非衍生物的生物死去时，你可以派出一个1/1黑色老鼠衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·104 | Ogre Slumlord | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Rats you control have deathtouch.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的老鼠具有死触异能。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·104 | Ogre Slumlord | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "His tenement is filled with the most vile, disgusting vermin. It's infested with rats, too."\n—Branko One-Ear
trans-unit.target: 「他的居所充满最邪恶恶心的病媒，还有鼠辈横行。」 ～单耳布兰可

trans-unit.resname: AFC·105 | Phthisis | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Phthisis
trans-unit.target: 痨病

trans-unit.resname: AFC·105 | Phthisis | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature. Its controller loses life equal to its power plus its toughness.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物。其操控者失去等同于其力量与防御力加总的生命。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·105 | Phthisis | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Suspend 5—{1}{B} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{B} and exile it with five time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: 延缓5～{1}{B}（除了从你手上施放此牌，你可以支付{1}{B}并将它放逐，且上面有五个计时指示物。在你的维持开始时，从其上移去一个计时指示物。当移去最后一个时，施放它且不需支付其法术力费用。）

trans-unit.resname: AFC·106 | Piper of the Swarm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Piper of the Swarm
trans-unit.target: 鼠群魔笛手

trans-unit.resname: AFC·106 | Piper of the Swarm | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Rats you control have menace.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的老鼠具有威慑异能。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·106 | Piper of the Swarm | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}, {T}: Create a 1/1 black Rat creature token.
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}，{T}：派出一个1/1黑色老鼠衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·106 | Piper of the Swarm | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {2}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice three Rats: Gain control of target creature.
trans-unit.target: {2}{B}{B}，{T}，牺牲三个老鼠：获得目标生物的操控权。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·106 | Piper of the Swarm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If it has ears, it will dance to my tune."
trans-unit.target: 「只要它有耳朵，就会随着我的旋律起舞。」

trans-unit.resname: AFC·107 | Plaguecrafter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Plaguecrafter
trans-unit.target: 播疫师

trans-unit.resname: AFC·107 | Plaguecrafter | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Plaguecrafter enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. Each player who can't discards a card.
trans-unit.target: 当播疫师进战场时，每位牌手各牺牲一个生物或鹏洛客。每位无法如此作的牌手各弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·107 | Plaguecrafter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "My power is generosity, in a way. I give my survivors an appreciation for their lives."
trans-unit.target: 「我的能力可谓慷慨。我让从我手下幸存的人对生命心怀感恩。」

trans-unit.resname: AFC·108 | Pontiff of Blight | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pontiff of Blight
trans-unit.target: 枯萎主教

trans-unit.resname: AFC·108 | Pontiff of Blight | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
trans-unit.target: 敲诈（每当你施放咒语时，你可以支付{W/B}。若你如此作，则每位对手各失去1点生命，且你获得等量的生命。）

trans-unit.resname: AFC·108 | Pontiff of Blight | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Other creatures you control have extort. (If a creature has multiple instances of extort, each triggers separately.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他生物具有敲诈异能。（若某生物具有数个敲诈异能，则每一个都会分别触发。）

trans-unit.resname: AFC·109 | Reassembling Skeleton | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reassembling Skeleton
trans-unit.target: 重组骷髅妖

trans-unit.resname: AFC·109 | Reassembling Skeleton | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}：将重组骷髅妖从你的坟墓场横置移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·109 | Reassembling Skeleton | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "They may show up with the wrong thigh bone or mandible, but they always show up."\n—Zul Ashur, lich lord
trans-unit.target: 「他们现身时可能装错了大腿骨或颔骨，但他们总是会现身。」 ～巫妖领主祝亚许

trans-unit.resname: AFC·110 | Shriekmaw | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shriekmaw
trans-unit.target: 尖吼怪

trans-unit.resname: AFC·110 | Shriekmaw | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
trans-unit.target: 恐惧（此生物只能被神器生物和／或黑色生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: AFC·110 | Shriekmaw | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Shriekmaw enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.
trans-unit.target: 当尖吼怪进战场时，消灭目标非神器且非黑色的生物。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·110 | Shriekmaw | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Evoke {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)
trans-unit.target: 呼魂{1}{B}（你可以支付此咒语的呼魂费用来施放它。若你如此作，当它进战场时便牺牲之。）

trans-unit.resname: AFC·111 | Unburial Rites | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Unburial Rites
trans-unit.target: 掀坟仪式

trans-unit.resname: AFC·111 | Unburial Rites | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·111 | Unburial Rites | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flashback {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 返照{3}{W}（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.resname: AFC·111 | Unburial Rites | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: All crave the Blessed Sleep. Few receive it.
trans-unit.target: 大家都祈求着受福安眠。很少人能够蒙福。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·112 | Victimize | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Victimize
trans-unit.target: 生体活祭

trans-unit.resname: AFC·112 | Victimize | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Choose two target creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return the chosen cards to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 选择两张目标在你坟墓场中的生物牌。牺牲一个生物。如果你如此作，则将所选之牌横置移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·112 | Victimize | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Die. But die knowing that your pathetic life will yield a great bounty for me."\n—Zul Ashur, lich lord
trans-unit.target: 「去死吧。知道你这悲惨的一生能为我换回莫大回报，你也死得明白。」 ～巫妖领主祝亚许

trans-unit.resname: AFC·113 | Anger | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Anger
trans-unit.target: 愤怒

trans-unit.resname: AFC·113 | Anger | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Haste
trans-unit.target: 敏捷

trans-unit.resname: AFC·113 | Anger | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As long as Anger is in your graveyard and you control a Mountain, creatures you control have haste.
trans-unit.target: 只要愤怒在你的坟墓场，并且你操控山脉，由你操控的生物便具有敏捷异能。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·113 | Anger | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Molten earth has no anger of its own. Only by infusing it with your own rage can the magma seethe and take shape."\n—Koth of the Hammer
trans-unit.target: 「炽焰大地本身不会愤怒。唯有你将自身怒气倾注当中后，其岩浆方能翻滚成形。」 ～锤族的寇斯

trans-unit.resname: AFC·114 | Apex of Power | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Apex of Power
trans-unit.target: 无上力量

trans-unit.resname: AFC·114 | Apex of Power | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile the top seven cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among them.
trans-unit.target: 放逐你牌库顶的七张牌。直到回合结束，你可以从其中施放咒语。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·114 | Apex of Power | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If this spell was cast from your hand, add ten mana of any one color.
trans-unit.target: 如果此咒语是从你手上施放，则加十点任意颜色的单色法术力。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·114 | Apex of Power | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "As I desire, so it shall be."\n—Nicol Bolas
trans-unit.target: 「吾之所欲，必能成型。」 ～尼可波拉斯

trans-unit.resname: AFC·115 | Bogardan Hellkite | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bogardan Hellkite
trans-unit.target: 博卡登残虐者

trans-unit.resname: AFC·115 | Bogardan Hellkite | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flash
trans-unit.target: 闪现

trans-unit.resname: AFC·115 | Bogardan Hellkite | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: AFC·115 | Bogardan Hellkite | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When Bogardan Hellkite enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.
trans-unit.target: 当博卡登残虐者进战场时，它对任意数量的目标造成共5点伤害，你可以任意分配。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·116 | Chain Reaction | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chain Reaction
trans-unit.target: 连锁反应

trans-unit.resname: AFC·116 | Chain Reaction | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Chain Reaction deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 连锁反应对每个生物各造成X点伤害，X为战场上的生物数量。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·116 | Chain Reaction | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We train for the improbable, like lightning striking the same place twice, or striking everywhere at once."\n—Nundari, Sea Gate militia captain
trans-unit.target: 「我们的训练是要应付不可能的事，例如闪电两次都落在同一个地方，或是一次落在所有地方。」 ～海户义勇军队长努达力

trans-unit.resname: AFC·117 | Chaos Warp | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chaos Warp
trans-unit.target: 混沌歪曲

trans-unit.resname: AFC·117 | Chaos Warp | Card Text
trans-unit.source: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 选择目标永久物。其拥有者将它洗入其牌库，然后展示其牌库顶牌。如果该牌是永久物牌，则该牌手将它放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·118 | Commune with Lava | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Commune with Lava
trans-unit.target: 熔岩通贯

trans-unit.resname: AFC·118 | Commune with Lava | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Exile the top X cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
trans-unit.target: 放逐你牌库顶的X张牌。直到你下一个回合的回合结束，你可以使用这些牌。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·118 | Commune with Lava | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Atarka conquered Qadat, the Fire Rim, long ago, winning over its efreet with a promise to spread the glory of fire to all the world.
trans-unit.target: 很久以前，安塔卡征服了圜焰克达，凭借将火焰荣光传扬世界的许诺赢得了魔神的支持。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·119 | Dark-Dweller Oracle | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dark-Dweller Oracle
trans-unit.target: 暗栖先知

trans-unit.resname: AFC·119 | Dark-Dweller Oracle | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.
trans-unit.target: {1}，牺牲一个生物：放逐你的牌库顶牌。本回合中，你可以使用该牌。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·119 | Dark-Dweller Oracle | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Eyes are unnecessary for seeing the future.
trans-unit.target: 预见未来不需用眼。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·120 | Demanding Dragon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Demanding Dragon
trans-unit.target: 索祭巨龙

trans-unit.resname: AFC·120 | Demanding Dragon | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: AFC·120 | Demanding Dragon | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Demanding Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage to target opponent unless that player sacrifices a creature.
trans-unit.target: 当索祭巨龙进战场时，除非目标对手牺牲一个生物，否则它对该牌手造成5点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·120 | Demanding Dragon | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A knight's devotion to their steed goes only so far.
trans-unit.target: 骑士与爱马之间的不渝忠诚也只能到此为止。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·121 | Dire Fleet Daredevil | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dire Fleet Daredevil
trans-unit.target: 焦炬舰队冒险客

trans-unit.resname: AFC·121 | Dire Fleet Daredevil | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: First strike
trans-unit.target: 先攻

trans-unit.resname: AFC·121 | Dire Fleet Daredevil | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Dire Fleet Daredevil enters the battlefield, exile target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard. You may cast it this turn, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell. If that spell would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 当焦炬舰队冒险客进战场时，将目标瞬间或法术牌从对手的坟墓场放逐。本回合中，你可以施放之，且你可以将法术力视同任意种类的法术力来支付施放该咒语的费用。如果该咒语本回合中将进入坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·122 | Disrupt Decorum | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Disrupt Decorum
trans-unit.target: 礼数不周

trans-unit.resname: AFC·122 | Disrupt Decorum | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Goad all creatures you don't control. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)
trans-unit.target: 煽惑所有不由你操控的生物。（直到你的下一个回合，那些生物每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击除你以外的牌手，则必须如此作。）

trans-unit.resname: AFC·122 | Disrupt Decorum | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Dinner and politics don't mix.
trans-unit.target: 餐宴议事难两全。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·123 | Dragonlord's Servant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dragonlord's Servant
trans-unit.target: 龙王仆役

trans-unit.resname: AFC·123 | Dragonlord's Servant | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: 你施放的龙咒语减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·123 | Dragonlord's Servant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Atarka serving-goblins coat themselves with grease imbued with noxious herbs, hoping to discourage their ravenous masters from adding them to the meal.
trans-unit.target: 服侍安塔卡的鬼怪在身上涂满加了毒草的油脂，希望他们永无餍足的主人不会拿他们加菜。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·124 | Dragonmaster Outcast | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dragonmaster Outcast
trans-unit.target: 受逐召龙师

trans-unit.resname: AFC·124 | Dragonmaster Outcast | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control six or more lands, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若你操控六个或更多地，则派出一个5/5红色，具飞行异能的龙衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·124 | Dragonmaster Outcast | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This world will be ruled by its rightful sovereigns, not these hideous pretenders."
trans-unit.target: 「这个世界将由适格的君王所统治，而不是这些丑陋的觊觎者。」

trans-unit.resname: AFC·125 | Dream Pillager | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dream Pillager
trans-unit.target: 掠梦巨龙

trans-unit.resname: AFC·125 | Dream Pillager | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: AFC·125 | Dream Pillager | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Dream Pillager deals combat damage to a player, exile that many cards from the top of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among those exiled cards.
trans-unit.target: 每当掠梦巨龙对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，从你的牌库顶放逐等量的牌。直到回合结束，你可以从所放逐的牌之中施放咒语。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·125 | Dream Pillager | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Its wings shimmer with dreams absorbed from its enemies.
trans-unit.target: 攫自敌人的眠梦点缀双翼，闪烁光芒。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·126 | Etali, Primal Storm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Etali, Primal Storm
trans-unit.target: 始啸埃泰力

trans-unit.resname: AFC·126 | Etali, Primal Storm | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever Etali, Primal Storm attacks, exile the top card of each player's library, then you may cast any number of spells from among those cards without paying their mana costs.
trans-unit.target: 每当始啸埃泰力攻击时，放逐每位牌手的牌库顶牌，然后你可以从这些牌之中施放任意数量的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·126 | Etali, Primal Storm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The storm rages and the earth breaks.
trans-unit.target: 风暴肆虐，大地开裂。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·127 | Gratuitous Violence | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gratuitous Violence
trans-unit.target: 无端暴力

trans-unit.resname: AFC·127 | Gratuitous Violence | Card Text
trans-unit.source: If a creature you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个由你操控的生物将对任一永久物或牌手造成伤害，则改为它对该永久物或牌手造成两倍的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·127 | Gratuitous Violence | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: What was supposed to be a quiet time in town turned into an adventure of its own.
trans-unit.target: 小镇原本的恬静时光平添几道浓墨重彩。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·128 | Hoard-Smelter Dragon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hoard-Smelter Dragon
trans-unit.target: 炼储巨龙

trans-unit.resname: AFC·128 | Hoard-Smelter Dragon | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
